SELECT Customer_Id,Customer_Name,Account_Balance FROM sys_customer_info_t
(Create_User IN (SELECT User_Id FROM sys_user_info_t WHERE Create_User=#{userId}) OR Create_User=#{userId})
and Customer_Name like "%${searchCustomer}%"

SELECT cu.Customer_Id,cu.contract_code,cu.Customer_Name,cu.Customer_Phone,cu.Customer_Email,cu.Customer_Company,cu.Customer_office,cu.Customer_Address, cm.Account_Balance,cm.Trade_Time,cu.Create_Time,u.User_Name FROM sys_customer_info_t cu LEFT JOIN sys_user_info_t u ON cu.Create_User = u.User_Id LEFT JOIN (SELECT mcu.Customer_Id,mcu.Trade_Time,ctr.Account_Balance FROM (SELECT Customer_Id,MAX(Trade_Time) AS Trade_Time FROM customer_trade_record GROUP BY Customer_Id) mcu LEFT JOIN customer_trade_record ctr ON mcu.Customer_Id=ctr.Customer_Id AND ctr.Trade_Time=mcu.Trade_Time) cm ON cu.Customer_Id=cm.Customer_Id
(cu.Create_User IN (SELECT User_Id FROM sys_user_info_t WHERE Create_User=#{userId}) OR cu.Create_User=#{userId})
AND cu.Customer_Name LIKE '%${customerName}%'
ORDER BY cu.Create_Time DESC
limit ${page.start},${page.limit}

SELECT count(*) FROM sys_customer_info_t cu LEFT JOIN sys_user_info_t u ON cu.Create_User = u.User_Id LEFT JOIN (SELECT mcu.Customer_Id,mcu.Trade_Time,ctr.Account_Balance FROM (SELECT Customer_Id,MAX(Trade_Time) AS Trade_Time FROM customer_trade_record GROUP BY Customer_Id) mcu LEFT JOIN customer_trade_record ctr ON mcu.Customer_Id=ctr.Customer_Id AND ctr.Trade_Time=mcu.Trade_Time) cm ON cu.Customer_Id=cm.Customer_Id
(cu.Create_User IN (SELECT User_Id FROM sys_user_info_t WHERE Create_User=#{userId}) OR cu.Create_User=#{userId})
